add

public void add(Component c)
Description copied from interface: Container
Adds a Component to this container. Component may be preconfigured with Bounds (absolute positioning) or Container may enforce a layout and adjust the Bounds of each component added, depending on layout policy.

paint

public void paint(Layer layer)
Description copied from interface: Component
Paint the component. The component's coordinate system origin will be adjusted so that 0,0 is the upper-left point, and drawing will be clipped to a rectangle spanning the width/height.
